pages.text: $(li)The Projectile Protection enchantment can be applied in any kind of Helmet, Chestplate, Leggins, Boots, $(l:patchouli:weapons/shield)Shields$(/l), $(l:patchouli:pets/vanilla/leather_horse_armor)Horse Armors$(/l) and $(l:patchouli:pets/revamped_wolf/leather_wolf_armor)Wolf Armors$(/l).$(br)$(li)This enchantment reduces the damage receives from projectiles as $(l:patchouli:weapons/arrows)Arrows$(/l) and fire balls.
pages.title: Projectile Protection

pages.text: $(li)By default, it can be upgrade just until level IV.$(br)$(li)You can raise the level V of this enchantment using an $(l:patchouli:enchanting/quark/ancient_tome_projectile_protection)Ancient Tome (Projectile Protection)$(/l)
